markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Force Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=1896)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 387 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You fire an arrow-shaped bolt of force, one of the most common and reliable forms of battle magic. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage to the target.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d4+1.
name: Force Bolt
